name: Scarlet (luciax1307)
description:
This is a student project I developed with Christina Wang in one of our classes, completed in three months.

=================

Scarlet is a 3D third-person action game with a sci-fi theme. It is an adventure of Scarlet, a powerful robot warrior in this deserted factory area where she defeats monsters, tries to find her friend but gradually reveals some hidden truth about her species. Scarlet aims to provide players with smooth and challenging action battles as well as a beautiful sci-fi world to explore.
